descriptor: Pb comes back from the vet + J proposes to announce it to Pb's father
C w R are making a homemade cappuccino !
J encourages R and C to return to the cafe to take their place
M begs Ra to lend her money
Pb brings back her father's dog
Pb asks to see Frank her father, but in the end it's Frank junior
He decides to continue the conversation with Pb outside
R w C hurry to drink their coffee to avoid the two guys
... but two guys steal their stuff!
Finally, the 4 guys have managed to recover their stuff and decide to make peace
the guys are going to see M at his new job... YMCA !
